properties.headline: Wind Advisory issued March 3 at 3:29AM PST until March 3 at 12:00PM PST by NWS Los Angeles/Oxnard CA
properties.description:
* WHAT...Areas of north to northeast winds 25 to 40 mph with gusts
up to 55 mph. Isolated gusts to 60 mph possible in the morning.

* WHERE...Santa Monica Mountains.

* WHEN...Until noon PST today.

* IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects and
make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may
result.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Roadways affected by gusty and potentially
hazardous cross winds include Kanan, Malibu Canyon, Topanga, and
Decker Canyon Roads.
properties.instruction:
Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high
profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

NWSheadline: WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON PST TODAY... ...HIGH WIND WARNING IS CANCELLED
